archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: SAP SuccessFactors
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
SAP SuccessFactors HCM suite providing a core HR function. Delivered as a SaaS.
SuccessFactors suite consists of a number of modules, only some of which will be implemented and used by POL. These are: Learning Already Live, but regression impact Employee Central Wave 1 Employee Central Payroll Wave 1 Onboarding Wave 1 Advanced Reporting Wave 1 SuccessFactors Mobile Wave 1 Recruiting Wave 1 (Recruitment Management) / Wave 2 (Recruitment Marketing) Compensation Wave 2 Succession & Development Wave2 Workforce Analytics Wave 2 Workforce Planning Wave 2
